keyword: how many calories in a cinnamon roll
title: How Many Calories in a Cinnamon Roll?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a cinnamon roll, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and tweaks for variations like no icing.
h1: How Many Calories in a Cinnamon Roll?
assumptions: Standard bakery-style cinnamon roll with icing, approximately 100 g, including dough, cinnamon filling, and cream cheese frosting.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical cinnamon roll contains about 300 calories, with high carbs and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cinnamon roll without frosting?
faqs.a: About 220 calories, saving around 80 kcal from the icing.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Typically 45 g total carbs, including 25 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are cinnamon rolls high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 12 g total fat per roll, with 5 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in a cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Smaller rolls (50 g) may have 150-200 kcal; larger ones up to 400+ kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein content of a cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Low at about 4 g per standard roll.
